query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'proposals' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2p3K1dfddpGHimM.570595ac1fed --database P6CTqT8eNBMi3wEqmJdcEm --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'proposals' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE
id	int
customerId	int
userId	int
title	varchar
status	enum
proposalDate	timestamp
electricityBillId	int
gasBillId	int
calculations	json
slidesData	json
slideCount	int
pdfUrl	varchar
pptUrl	varchar
lastExportedAt	timestamp
createdAt	timestamp
updatedAt	timestamp
deletedAt	timestamp
